content:
[H4L]Cl2 (0.006 g, 0.01 mmol) and MnCl2·4H2O (0.020 g, 0.10 mmol) were mixed in H2O/MeOH/EtOH (3:0.5:0.5 v/v 4 mL), and the mixture was stirred for 10 min. Then, dicyandiamide (0.168 g, 2 mmol) was added with stirring. The resulting suspension was kept at 100 °C for 72 h in a sealed glass bottle. The yellow crystals were separated by filtration, rinsed several times with H2O and dried in air. Yield: 68%. Anal. Calcd for C26H18MnN2O10: C, 54.41; N, 4.88; H, 3.14. Found, C, 54.32; N, 4.54; H, 3.08. IR data (KBr, cm−1): 3472(br), 3113(w), 3010(m), 1671(m), 1619(s), 1562(s), 1536(m), 1395(s), 1338(s), 1173(m), 1068(m), 923(m), 757(m), 689(s), 507(m).

Synthesis of compound <bold>2</bold>

[H4L]Cl2 (0.006 g, 0.01 mmol) and NiCl2·6H2O (0.024 g, 0.10 mmol) were mixed in H2O/MeOH/EtOH (3:0.5:0.5 v/v 4 mL) and stirred for 10 min. Dicyandiamide (0.168 g, 2 mmol) was then added with stirring. The resulting suspension was kept at 100 °C for 48 h in a sealed glass bottle. The light yellow crystals were filtered off, rinsed several times with H2O and dried in air. Yield: 73%. Anal. Calcd for C26H50N2NiO26: C, 36.05; N, 3.24; H, 5.78. Found, C, 36.23; N, 3.32; H, 5.65. IR data (KBr, cm−1): 3229(br), 3110(w), 3060(w), 1648(m), 1613(s), 1550(s), 1471(m), 1347(s), 1211(s), 1073(m), 826(m), 727(s), 582(m).

Synthesis of compound 1

[H4L]Cl2 (0.006 g, 0.01 mmol) and MnCl2⋅4H2O (0.020 g, 0.10 mmol) were mixed in H2O/MeOH/EtOH (3:0.5:0.5 v/v 4 mL), and the mixture was stirred for 10 min. Then, dicyandiamide (0.168 g, 2 mmol) was added with stirring. The resulting suspension was kept at 100 °C for 72 h in a sealed glass bottle. The yellow crystals were separated by filtration, rinsed several times with H2O and dried in air. Yield: 68%. Anal. Calcd for C26H18MnN2O10: C, 54.41; N, 4.88; H, 3.14. Found, C, 54.32; N, 4.54; H, 3.08. IR data (KBr, cm-1): 3472(br), 3113(w), 3010(m), 1671(m), 1619(s), 1562(s), 1536(m), 1395(s), 1338(s), 1173(m), 1068(m), 923(m), 757(m), 689(s), 507(m).

Synthesis of compound 2

[H4L]Cl2 (0.006 g, 0.01 mmol) and NiCl2⋅6H2O (0.024 g, 0.10 mmol) were mixed in H2O/MeOH/EtOH (3:0.5:0.5 v/v 4 mL) and stirred for 10 min. Dicyandiamide (0.168 g, 2 mmol) was then added with stirring. The resulting suspension was kept at 100 °C for 48 h in a sealed glass bottle. The light yellow crystals were filtered off, rinsed several times with H2O and dried in air. Yield: 73%. Anal. Calcd for C26H50N2NiO26: C, 36.05; N, 3.24; H, 5.78. Found, C, 36.23; N, 3.32; H, 5.65. IR data (KBr, cm-1): 3229(br), 3110(w), 3060(w), 1648(m), 1613(s), 1550(s), 1471(m), 1347(s), 1211(s), 1073(m), 826(m), 727(s), 582(m).
